to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: brltty and braillenote
body:
Hi all,

  This might not be the place to ask this, but since brltty v2.99z, they claim the braillenote is supported, but is it still supported in newer versions? For the life of me I cannot figure out how to do an accessible install of a distro via my BrailleNote's braille display. If anyone has hints or tips for me that'd be great. I don't have an external synth nor do I have the cash for one. I'll be connecting via a serial line. I need do be able to install a distro without any problems by september, and if anyone has a screen name and wants to talk me through this online feel free email me off list.

Cody
_______________________________________________
Speakup mailing list
Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
